item.title: 数据显示，第三季度人工智能风险投资继续激增
item.description: 随着华尔街对人工智能相关公司的热捧，Crunchbase 周一提供的数据显示，该行业在第三季度获得了大量风险投资，包括 Anthropic 在内的多家公司获得了数十亿美元的投资。【原文：As the rush towards AI-related companies continues on Wall Street, data from Crunchbase showed on Monday that the sector enjoyed a bulk of venture funding in the third quarter, with names including Anthropic raking in billions.】

item.title: 法拉利完成菲奥拉诺附近的电子涡流测试赛道
item.description: 法拉利跑车制造商本周一表示，在不到四个月的时间内，法拉利已完成了其菲奥兰诺测试赛道旁的新测试赛道--e-漩涡赛道的建设。【原文：Ferrari has completed the construction of e-Vortex, the new test circuit next to its Fiorano test track in less than four months, the sports car maker said on Monday.】

item.title: AMD 与 OpenAI 签订人工智能芯片供应协议，允许其持有 10%的股份
item.description: AMD 周一表示，它将向 OpenAI 供应人工智能芯片，这是一项为期多年的交易，将带来数百亿美元的年收入，而且 ChatGPT 的创建者可以选择购买这家芯片制造商最多约 10% 的股份。【原文：AMD said on Monday it will supply artificial intelligence chips to OpenAI in a multi-year deal that would bring in tens of billions of dollars in annual revenue and give the ChatGPT creator the option to buy up to roughly 10% of the chipmaker.】

item.title: 特朗普政府推动对稀土公司和芯片制造商的投资
item.description: 特朗普政府正在加大力度，通过将联邦拨款转化为关键公司的股权，确保美国关键矿物和半导体供应链的安全。【原文：The Trump administration is ramping up its efforts to secure U.S. supply chains for critical minerals and semiconductors by converting federal grants into equity stakes in key companies.】

item.title: 美国第五第三银行将以 109 亿美元收购地区性贷款机构 Comerica
item.description: 美国第五第三银行（Fifth Third）周一同意以价值 109 亿美元的全股票交易收购地区性贷款机构 Comerica，旨在扩大其在主要增长市场的业务。【原文：U.S. bank Fifth Third on Monday agreed to buy regional lender Comerica in an all-stock deal valued at $10.9 billion, aiming to expand its presence in key growth markets.】

item.title: 早间新闻来自东京和巴黎的政治冲击
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，Qualtrics 将以 67.5 亿美元收购医疗保健技术公司 Press Ganey
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周一援引知情人士的话报道，私募股权公司银湖（Silver Lake）旗下的客户调查软件制造商 Qualtrics 已同意以 67.5 亿美元（包括债务）的价格收购医疗市场研究公司 Press Ganey Forsta。【原文：Customer survey software maker Qualtrics, owned by private equity firm Silver Lake, has agreed to buy healthcare market research company Press Ganey Forsta for $6.75 billion, including debt, the Financial Times reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 波音公司和空中客车公司表示暂无推出新型喷气机的计划
item.description: 波音公司和空中客车公司的高管对即将决定更换其最畅销的窄体机型的猜测有所抑制，他们告诉主要的投资者，实现所需的性能飞跃需要时间。【原文：Executives from Boeing and Airbus dampened speculation of imminent decisions to replace their best-selling narrowbody models, telling a major audience of investors that it would take time to achieve the required jump in performance.】

item.title: 前央行经济学家：日本工资前景是日本央行加息时机的关键
item.description: 日本央行前首席经济学家龟田诚作周一告诉路透社，日本的工资前景将是决定央行多久恢复加息的关键，他预测下一次加息将在 12 月或 1 月。【原文：Japan's wage outlook will be key to how soon the central bank resumes interest rate hikes, its former top economist Seisaku Kameda told Reuters on Monday, predicting the next increase to come either in December or January.】

item.title: 卡尼瞄准国家建设项目，加拿大投资者押注国防和建筑股
item.description: 投资者表示，随着渥太华承诺增加军费开支并加快推进可促进经济发展的大型基础设施项目，加拿大国防、建筑和金属采矿业的股票将从中受益。【原文：Canadian defense, construction and metal mining shares stand to benefit as Ottawa commits to increased military spending and the speeding up of major infrastructure projects that could boost the economy, investors say.】

item.title: 消息人士称，随着经济发展步伐加快，德国失业率有望下降
item.description: 一位消息人士周一援引政府的预测告诉路透社，随着欧洲最大经济体期待已久的复苏步伐加快，德国的失业水平有望在未来两年内下降。【原文：Germany's unemployment level is expected to fall in the two next years as the long-awaited recovery of Europe's biggest economy gathers pace, a source told Reuters on Monday, citing government forecasts.】

item.title: 美国联邦政府停摆进入第六天，裁员威胁迫在眉睫
item.description: 周一，美国政府停摆进入第六天，唐纳德-特朗普总统领导的共和党和国会民主党仍在僵持，白宫威胁要加大压力，下令大规模裁减联邦工作人员。【原文：The U.S. government shutdown entered its sixth day on Monday, with President Donald Trump's Republicans and congressional Democrats still at an impasse and the White House threatening to ramp up pressure by ordering mass layoffs of federal workers.】

item.title: 投资者关注人工智能和降息主题，华尔街期货上涨
item.description: 美国股指期货周一上涨，延续了上周的涨势，原因是与人工智能相关的交易纷至沓来，以及劳动力市场趋势疲软增强了降息预期。【原文：U.S. stock index futures rose on Monday, building on gains from last week as a flurry of AI-related dealmaking and softer labor market trends bolstered expectations for an interest-rate cut.】

item.title: 路透社报道称华盛顿有意入股后，临界金属公司股价大涨
item.description: 路透社援引四位熟悉谈判情况的人士的话报道，特朗普政府正在讨论入股这家处于发展阶段的矿业公司，此后，Critical Metals 公司的股票在周一盘前交易中大涨超过 75%。【原文：Shares of Critical Metals surged over 75% in premarket trading on Monday after Reuters reported the Trump administration is discussing taking an equity stake in the development-stage mining company, citing four people familiar with the talks.】

item.title: 渣打银行称 CIO 基金资产达 30 亿美元，并推出伊斯兰套件
item.description: 渣打银行周一表示，其 Signature CIO 基金在推出三年后管理的资产已增至 30 亿美元，并将推出符合伊斯兰教法的版本以满足日益增长的需求。【原文：Standard Chartered said on Monday that assets under management at its Signature CIO Funds have risen to $3 billion, three years after launch, and it will introduce a Shariah-compliant version to meet growing demand.】

item.title: VIEW 总理勒科尔努辞职后法国股市暴跌
item.description: 据法国媒体报道，法国总理塞巴斯蒂安-勒科努（Sebastien Lecornu）已经辞职，法国股市周一加速下挫。【原文：A selloff in French markets gathered pace on Monday after French media reports that Prime Minister Sebastien Lecornu has resigned.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，阿斯利康与 Algen 签订了价值 5.55 亿美元的基因编辑技术协议
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周一报道，阿斯利康公司（AstraZeneca）与位于旧金山的生物技术公司 Algen Biotechnologies 签订了一项价值 5.55 亿美元的协议。【原文：AstraZeneca has signed a $555 million deal with a San Francisco-based biotech business Algen Biotechnologies, The Financial Times reported on Monday.】

item.title: 花旗集团对英国股市态度转冷，对新兴市场加倍看好
item.description: 花旗集团将英国股票评级从 "增持 "下调至 "减持"，同时将新兴市场（EM）股票评级上调至 "增持"，战略支点转向周期性和人工智能驱动的增长机会。【原文：Citigroup has double downgraded UK equities to "underweight" from "overweight", while upgrading Emerging Markets (EM) to "overweight" in a strategic pivot toward cyclical and AI-driven growth opportunities.】

item.title: 公司称布鲁诺-勒梅尔不再担任 ASML 顾问
item.description: 法国前财政部长布鲁诺-勒梅尔（Bruno Le Maire）不再担任 ASML 的顾问，这家荷兰芯片设备制造商的发言人周一告诉路透社。【原文：France's former finance minister Bruno Le Maire is no longer an advisor at ASML , a spokesperson for the Dutch chip equipment maker told Reuters on Monday.】

item.title: 摩根大通将欧元区评级提升至 "增持"，称其股票具有吸引力
item.description: 摩根大通周一将其对欧元区的立场从 "中性 "上调至 "增持"，指出在经历了几个月的表现不佳和政策支持之后，该地区的股票已变得更具吸引力。【原文：J.P. Morgan upgraded its stance on the euro zone to "overweight" from "neutral" on Monday, noting that the equities in the region have become more attractive after several months of underperformance and policy support.】

item.title: 消息人士称，欧洲航天巨头的框架协议将需要数周时间
item.description: 本周一，一位知情人士透露，意大利莱昂纳多公司与法国泰雷兹公司和空中客车公司就新的欧洲航天巨头达成框架协议尚需数周时间。【原文：A framework agreement between Italy's Leonardo and France's Thales and Airbus for a new European space giant will require some weeks, a source with knowledge of the matter said on Monday.】

item.title: 丰田称私有化主要供应商的交易推迟至二月或更晚些时候
item.description: 丰田汽车公司周一表示，其对叉车制造商丰田自动织机（Toyota Industries）的要约收购现在可能会在二月份或更晚些时候开始，从而将之前预计的 12 月初启动时间推后。【原文：Toyota Motor said on Monday that its tender offer for forklift maker Toyota Industries is now likely to begin in February or later, pushing back a previously expected early December launch.】

item.title: 报道称欧洲卫星合并谈判因工作共享问题受阻
item.description: 据法国《论坛报》报道，在现有合作伙伴泰雷兹和莱昂纳多要求更多时间后，空客、泰雷兹和莱昂纳多之间关于创建一家新的欧洲主要卫星制造商的谈判遇到了障碍。【原文：Talks between Airbus , Thales and Leonardo to create a major new European satellite manufacturer have hit a roadblock after existing partners Thales and Leonardo asked for more time, French daily La Tribune reported.】

item.title: 日本朝日啤酒公司在遭受网络攻击后重启啤酒生产
item.description: 朝日集团发言人周一表示，该集团在日本的六家啤酒厂已重新开始生产。【原文：Asahi Group has restarted production at its six Japanese beer plants after the brewer's operations were disrupted by a cyberattack, a spokesperson said on Monday.】

item.title: 礼来公司将在印度投资超过 10 亿美元扩大生产能力
item.description: 礼来公司（Eli Lilly）周一表示，未来几年将在印度投资超过 10 亿美元，通过当地制药商促进生产和供应，因为该公司正寻求利用熟练劳动力来支持其全球生产扩张。【原文：Eli Lilly will invest more than $1 billion in India in the coming years to boost manufacturing and supply through local drugmakers, the company said on Monday, as it seeks to tap into skilled workforce to bolster its global manufacturing expansion.】

item.title: 人工智能推动 WorldQuant 大学量化竞赛参赛人数激增
item.description: 对冲基金 WorldQuant 表示，由于人工智能的广泛应用降低了大学生开发量化交易模型的门槛，其旗舰量化竞赛今年吸引了创纪录的参赛人数。【原文：Hedge fund WorldQuant said its flagship quantitative competition attracted a record number of entrants this year, as wider use of artificial intelligence lowered barriers for university students to develop quantitative trading models.】

item.title: 英国阿斯顿-马丁公司预计 2025 财年亏损扩大
item.description: 豪华汽车制造商阿斯顿-马丁（Aston Martin）周一警告称，全年亏损将超过市场预期，原因是销量下滑以及关税和新实施的配额制度带来的经济压力。【原文：Luxury carmaker Aston Martin warned on Monday of a full-year loss that would be bigger than market consensus, citing softer volumes and economic pressures stemming from tariffs and a newly implemented quota system.】

item.title: 聚焦：中国在欧洲自动驾驶技术扩张中下注
item.description: 在美国市场受阻的情况下，中国自动驾驶技术公司正加速进军欧洲市场，设立总部、达成数据交易并进行道路测试，这引起了当地竞争对手对竞争问题的担忧。【原文：Blocked from the U.S. market, Chinese self-driving technology firms are accelerating their push into Europe, setting up headquarters, striking data deals, and road-testing - prompting alarm from local rivals over competition concerns.】

item.title: 由于欧洲和美国需求疲软，厨具制造商SEB下调了年度利润预期。
item.description: 法国厨具制造商 SEB 周一下调了年度销售额和利润预期，称欧洲市场的业务增长速度低于预期，而美国消费者和企业客户的 "观望 "态度也对公司产生了重大影响。【原文：French kitchenware maker SEB cut its annual sales and profit forecast on Monday, saying business has been slower than expected in Europe and a "wait and see" attitude among U.S. consumers and business clients has significantly impacted the company.】

item.title: 日本央行保持谨慎乐观的经济观点，警告工资不确定性
item.description: 日本央行周一维持了对经济前景的谨慎乐观看法，但警告说食品价格上涨和美国关税可能会拖累家庭和企业支出。【原文：The Bank of Japan on Monday maintained its cautiously optimistic view on the economic outlook, but warned rising food prices and U.S. tariffs could weigh on household and corporate spending.】
